description:
An update for "Animal Crossing™: Happy Home Designer" is now available from Nintendo eShop. All customers who own a copy of “Animal Crossing™: Happy Home Designer” should download the update. This will update the software to Version 2.0 with the following amendments:

- Various bugs have been fixed in order to provide a smoother gaming experience.

• Once the update has been downloaded, it will be installed automatically.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused, and recommend downloading this update to ensure a smooth game experience.
name:
AC: Happy Home Designer:
Update
